name: __EAdditiveBasePoseType
doc: For an additive animation, indicates what the animation is relative to.

ABPT_RefPose: Use the Skeleton's ref pose as base.
ABPT_AnimScaled: Use a whole animation as a base pose. BasePoseSeq must be set.
ABPT_AnimFrame: Use one frame of an animation as a base pose. BasePoseSeq and RefFrameIndex must be set (RefFrameIndex will be clamped).
ABPT_LocalAnimFrame: Use one frame of this animation. RefFrameIndex must be set (RefFrameIndex will be clamped).
